participant_1.background:
I'm a clumsy blonde, but my dog loves me anyway.
I'm not sure, but I can hear the difference between a C and a G.
I enjoy dressing up as my favorite characters from comic books and anime.
I wake up early and stretch before getting ready for my day.
i love the game halo.

participant_2.background:
I'm proud that I'm able to use my creative talents to make clay sculptures that help raise awareness about animal welfare issues.
My job at the gas station is going well, but I'm having trouble keeping up with my schoolwork.
I want to show my music to the world!
i sometimes wonder why i am not married.
I will tell my kids about my experience and inspire them to overcome their fears.

content.text: Hello! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to make clay sculptures to raise awareness about animal welfare issues. I'm also a musician and I want to show my music to the world!
That's awesome! What kind of clay sculptures do you make?
I make sculptures of animals that are in danger of extinction, like elephants and tigers. I also make sculptures of animals that are being abused, like dogs and cats.
That's really cool! I'm sure your sculptures are beautiful.
Thank you! I think they're pretty cool too.
What's your favorite animal?
That's a hard question to answer. I love all animals, but I'm particularly fond of dogs.
I have a dog named Charlie. He's a really good boy.
Aww, I love dogs. I have a dog named Chloe. She's a little bit crazy, but she's a great dog.
What kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar and the piano. I also sing.
That's awesome! I play the guitar too.
Cool! What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play rock music.
Me too! I love playing rock music.
What's your favorite rock song?
That's a tough question to answer. I have a lot of favorite rock songs.
Me too. I can't really pick one favorite rock song.
I guess we're both music lovers.
I guess so
